-------options:	[comment?type=jsdoc]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/md/replace6.md")[comment?type=jsdoc]

-------options:	[comment?type=jsdoc,text?indent=true]
		// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/md/replace6.md")[comment?type=jsdoc,text?indent=true]
